creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center in memory of Gail Liebes, a woman with a passion for art and a love of Japan, from her husband John, and her children Alison and Christopher
description: eagle with outstretched wings on rocky outcropping at center; three monkeys hidden in LRC
text: A large White-tailed Eagle with sharp claws detected a family of three monkeys cowering in a rocky cave. He is about to take off while the monkeys seem to desperately try to avoid such sontact.
title: White-tailed Eagle threatening monkeys
